headline: What J.D. Vances Primary Win Says About Populism and Resentment in the G.O.P.
sentences: Vance, the 37-year-old venture capitalist and author of the acclaimed memoir Hillbilly Elegy,? won the Republican Senate primary in Ohio  with the endorsement of Donald Trump.
